title: Sony LinkBuds S launch w/ same package as Pixel Buds Pro; ANC, Assistant, $199
content:
Google announced its Pixel Buds Pro recently, but they’re still a few weeks out. If you’re in need of the Assistant integration, smart features, and active noise cancellation today, Sony LinkBuds S might be exactly what you need.

more…

The post Sony LinkBuds S launch w/ same package as Pixel Buds Pro; ANC, Assistant, $199 appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Sony LinkBuds S deliver most of the same features of Google's upcoming Pixel Buds Pro, but with a lightweight design and more.
